00009 ChatView::ChatView(QWidget* parent)
00010     : KWebView(parent)
00011 {
00012     _d.reset(new Aki::ChatViewPrivate(this));
00013     setFocusPolicy(Qt::NoFocus);
00014     page()->setLinkDelegationPolicy(QWebPage::DelegateAllLinks);
00015     setContextMenuPolicy(Qt::CustomContextMenu);

00029 void
00030 ChatView::insertAwaySet(const QString& message)
00031 {
00032     QDomElement event = _d->createEvent(QLatin1String("awaySet"));
00033     event.appendChild(_d->message(i18n("You have set yourself away with \"%1\".", message)));
00034     event.appendChild(_d->awayMessage(message));
00035 
00036     _d->appendMessage(event);
00037 }

00043     event.appendChild(_d->message(i18n("You have returned from away.")));
00044 
00045     _d->appendMessage(event);
00046 }

00048 void
00049 ChatView::insertBanRemoved(const Aki::Irc::NickInfo& sender, const QString& banmask,
00050                            const QString& senderClass)
00051 {
00052     QDomElement event = _d->createEvent(QLatin1String("banRemoved"));
00053     event.appendChild(_d->message(i18n("%1 removed the ban on %2.",
00054                                        _d->span(senderClass, sender.nick()), banmask)));
00055     event.appendChild(_d->ban(banmask));
00056     event.appendChild(_d->by(sender, senderClass)); // TODO fix self???
00057 
00058     _d->appendMessage(event);
00059 }

00061 void
00062 ChatView::demotedFromFounder(const Aki::Irc::NickInfo& sender, const QString& senderClass,
00063                              const Aki::Irc::NickInfo& self)
00064 {
00065     const QString senderSpan = _d->span(senderClass, sender.nick());
00066 
00067     QDomElement event = _d->createEvent(QLatin1String("demotedFromFounder"));
00068     event.appendChild(_d->message(i18n("You were demoted from founder by %1.", senderSpan)));
00069     event.appendChild(_d->by(sender, senderClass));
00070     event.appendChild(_d->who(self, true));
00071 
00072     _d->appendMessage(event);
00073 }

00112 void
00113 ChatView::insertKicked(const Aki::Irc::NickInfo& sender, const QString& senderClass,
00114                        const QString& reason)
00115 {
00116     QDomElement event = _d->createEvent(QLatin1String("kicked"));
00117     event.appendChild(_d->message(i18n("You were kicked from the channel by %1.", sender.nick())));
00118     event.appendChild(_d->by(sender, senderClass, false));
00119     event.appendChild(_d->reason(reason));
00120 
00121     _d->appendMessage(event);
00122 }

00145 void ChatView::insertPromotedToFounder(const Aki::Irc::NickInfo& sender, const Aki::Irc::NickInfo& self,
00146                                        const QString& senderClass)
00147 {
00148     bool isSelf = sender.nick() == self.nick();
00149     QDomElement event = _d->createEvent(QLatin1String("promotedToFounder"));
00150     event.appendChild(_d->message(i18n("You were promoted to founder by %1",
00151                                        _d->span(senderClass, sender.nick()))));
00152     event.appendChild(_d->by(sender, senderClass, isSelf));
00153     event.appendChild(_d->who(self, true, QLatin1String("founder")));
00154 
00155     _d->appendMessage(event);
00156 }

00181 void
00182 ChatView::insertTopicChanged(const Aki::Irc::NickInfo& sender, const QString& senderClass,
00183                              const QString& newTopic, bool isSelf)
00184 {
00185     QDomElement event = _d->createEvent(QLatin1String("topicChanged"));
00186     if (isSelf) {
00187         event.appendChild(_d->message(i18n("You changed the topic to \"%1\".", newTopic)));
00188     } else {
00189         event.appendChild(_d->message(i18n("%1 changed the topic to \"%1\".", sender.nick(), newTopic)));
00190     }
00191 
00192     event.appendChild(_d->by(sender, senderClass, isSelf));
00193     event.appendChild(_d->topic(newTopic));
00194 
00195     _d->appendMessage(event);
00196 }

00198 void
00199 ChatView::insertVoiced(const Aki::Irc::NickInfo& sender, const Aki::Irc::NickInfo& self,
00200                        const QString& senderClass)
00201 {
00202     bool isSelf = sender.nick() == self.nick();
00203 
00204     QDomElement event = _d->createEvent(QLatin1String("voiced"));
00205     event.appendChild(_d->message(i18n("You were granted voice by %1", _d->span(senderClass, sender.nick()))));
00206     event.appendChild(_d->by(sender, senderClass, isSelf));
00207     event.appendChild(_d->who(self, true, QLatin1String("voice")));
00208 
00209     _d->appendMessage(event);
00210 }
